title: Bajaj Auto Vice Chairman Madhur Bajaj steps down due to health reasons
description: In a regulatory filing, Bajaj Auto said Madhur Bajaj has tendered his resignation from his position in the company with effect from the close of business hours on January 24, 2024.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
